meanings.definition: The property of certain materials that exhibit antiferromagnetic behavior.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are fascinated by the antiferromagnetisms in some materials.
meanings.sent2: The researchers conducted experiments to understand the antiferromagnetisms better.
meanings.sent3: The antiferromagnetisms in the lab seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: The complexity of antiferromagnetisms is like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained antiferromagnetisms with colorful illustrations.
